segment.phrase: Sindi ndi mwezi
Sindi amakonda kusewera masewera. Amakonda kudyetsa ziweto. Koma panali chinthu chimodzi chomwe Sindi amakonda koposa china chilichonse.
Sindi amakonda kuvina! Sindi akamavina, amasangalala ndipo dziko limaoneka kuti likusangalalanso. Agulugufe amavina naye, ndipo maluwa amaoneka kuwala.
Tsiku lina, agogo anamuuza Sindi nkhani yosangalatsa. “Sindi, ndiwe mtsikana wamkulu tsopano. Ndi nthawi yoti uzipita kusukulu.”
Koma Sindi samakhulupilira.
“Chimachitika n’chiyani kusukulu?” anafunsa Sindi.
“Kumakhala kuwerenga kwambiri ndi kulemba. Ukasangalala!” anatero agogo. Sindi anaganizira za izi. Mochulukira.
Sindi anaganizira za sukulu pamene amaonelera mwezi ukutuluka. Nanga akakapanda kuchita bwino pa kuwerenga ndi kulemba? Nanga akatha kuvina kusukulu?
Sindi akuyang’ana mwezi, anaona nkhope. Mwezi umamumwetulira!
“Usadandaule Sindi,” mwezi unatero. “Sukulu ndi yosangalatsa! Ukaona.”
Sindi anaumwetulira mwezi uja.
Nanga akhumudwa bwanji pamene mwezi umaoneka wokondwa ndi wopanda nkhawa?
Pamenepo Sindi anachita zomwe amachita akasangalala. Anavina! Anavina m’kuwala kwa mwezi. Ndipo Sindi anakagona akumwetulira.
Mmawa, Sindi anali akumwetulirabe. “Ukuwoneka wosangalala,” anatero agogo.
Sindi anaseka nati, “Ndikumva kusiyana mmawa walero.”
Mayi anamuperekeza Sindi kusukulu. “Ukhale ndi tsiku loyamba labwino,” anatero. Sindi anamva kumwetulira kwake kukusunthasuntha.
Koma Sindi anakoka mpweya ndi kuganizira za mwezi uja, ukumumwetulira.
“Inde,” anatero. “Ndikhala ndi tsiku labwino.”
Kusukulu, kunali kuwerenga ndi kulemba, koma kunalinso nyimbo ndi kuvina. Sindi anavina ndi anzake atsopano. Anali ndi tsiku labwino kwambiri.
